website_summaries.verdict: If you are on the short side or prefer a bike for laidback, enjoyable rides, this one is worth considering. Otherwise, it's not likely to suit your needs.
pros: Though manufactured for girls, this sturdy bike with 24-inch wheels is ideal for shorter women or those who prefer easy control for leisure riding
cons: At least one owner had an issue with the front tire losing air with no detectable problem
Not ideal if you have long legs or prefer a speedier bike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my grand daughter at 9 yr old. She loves it! Her legs were just a bit long for a 20". This will bridge her for the next 3 - 4 years. Very well built.
customer_reviews.author: Dewey J Kulzer

customer_reviews.title: it’s an excellent bike for a combination of comfort and speed
customer_reviews.text: My 60+ yrs old mom loves it. It’s a bit small for me, but it’s ok if it’s just a short ride to the beach. At this price, it’s an excellent bike for a combination of comfort and speed.
customer_reviews.author: stentorian

customer_reviews.title: Very decent price for a good looking bike
customer_reviews.text: This bike is for my daughter who will be used for her college life. She has been enjoying it a lot. Very decent price for a good looking bike.
customer_reviews.author: Anh Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Love the bike but...
customer_reviews.text: I love the bike, but I can't keep air in the front tire. There is no visible damage to the tire. Anyone have any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: Petunia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!!! Assembly just took 1 hour and it was easy! Very lightweight Strongly recommended My height is 160 cm
customer_reviews.author: Eli Naz

customer_reviews.title: May be good for casual ride, not a sporting bike
customer_reviews.text: Less than a month, and the chain slipped out twice Gears are only at the back, no gear in the pedal side.
customer_reviews.author: Rishi

customer_reviews.title: The greats shift smoothly and bike runs like a dream
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my 11 year old and she lives it. The greats shift smoothly and bike runs like a dream. It was just the thing to further her love of exercise and outdoors. Its well built and holds up to use so far
customer_reviews.author: joseph crosson

customer_reviews.title: Best bike
customer_reviews.text: Perfect side for my 10 year old and so adorable I want one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: this is good product, bought this for my 11 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: this is good product, bought this for my 11 year old daughter, It was just the thing to further her love of exercise and outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: lili

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality Bike, nimble ride, may be not fancy color or design but is lovely classic bike.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the bike; very fast delivery. Easy to follow assembly instructions.
customer_reviews.author: J. Maxey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great bike for price but came with some bent parts
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little Schwinn! Love it but TIRES flat
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a short old lady! Love the color. would have preferred a ready to ride version as the tires are flat and I do not have a pump!
customer_reviews.author: Sueanne

customer_reviews.title: Great for shorter people!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’0 tall and finding an adult bike that I could actually fit on was not easy. This is cute without being childish and adult-y without being bland and ugly. My only recommendation would be a seat cover if you plan on going on long rides.
customer_reviews.author: Haley M.

product_meta.title: Schwinn Mifflin 24" Wheel Hybrid Bicycle, Magenta, One Size
product_meta.description: Look good without trying on the 24 inch girl's Mifflin by Schwinn, a bike that will match your sense of style and has all the features to make it your comfortable go-to campus get around. This versatile hybrid is strong, lightweight, and ready for casual sunny rides or the regular morning commute. With styling reminiscent of a classic mixte frame, the Mifflin features a stylish and convenient chain Guard, so rest assured your pant leg won't get snagged on the way to work or class. 7-Speed grip Shifters with ergonomic grips are perfect for laidback urban riding, and the light and strong alloy rims add stability to ensure a comfortable upright riding position that's easy on your back. Rainy rides are no fun, but at least the sleek full wrap fenders keep you clean and dry while you ride this vintage hybrid mixte. All Schwinn bikes come with a limited lifetime warranty for as long as you own the bike. Enjoy the freedom of riding on a Schwinn.
feature_bullets: Schwinn girl's mixte steel frame is comfortable and offers a fast, nimble ride
7-Speed grip shifters with Shimano rear derailleur for precise, quick gear changes
Ergonomic handlebar grips make riding easier and more comfortable
Strong and light alloy rims offer added stability and durability
Full wrap color-matching fenders keep you clean and Dry while adding style.Fashionable chain guard protects pant legs from any snags
